trans-unit.source: Represents a displacement in 3-D space.
XAML Attribute Usage
XAML Values
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X%2A> component of this <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure.
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y%2A> component of this <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure.
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z%2A> component of this <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure.

This example shows how to subtract <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structures using the overloaded subtraction (`-`) operator and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> static <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Subtract%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 이 예제에서는 빼기 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 오버 로드 된 빼기를 사용 하 여 구조 (`-`) 연산자 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 정적 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Subtract%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> subtraction methods.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드에서는 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 빼기 메서드.

trans-unit.source: First, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structures are instantiated.

The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structures are subtracted using the overloaded (`-`) operator, and then they are subtracted using the static <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Subtract%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조체를 사용 하는 오버 로드 된 뺀 (`-`) 연산자를 한 다음 이러한 정적을 사용 하 여 제외 되며 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Subtract%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X" /> value.
The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y" /> value.
The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z" /> value.
Initializes a new instance of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.

Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure or to another <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체 또는 다른 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 구조체에 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체를 추가합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure used to translate the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체를 변환하는 데 사용되는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 구조체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure to be translated.

Translates the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure by the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure and returns the result as a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 구조체로 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체를 변환하고 그 결과를 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 구조체로 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The result of translating <paramref name="point" /> by <paramref name="vector" />.

The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Add%2A> method to translate a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Add%2A> 변환 하는 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 구조체는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to add.
The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to add.
Adds two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structures and returns the result as a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 두 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체를 추가하고 그 결과를 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체로 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The sum of <paramref name="vector1" /> and <paramref name="vector2" />.
The following example shows how to add two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structures.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 두 개의 추가 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to evaluate.
The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to evaluate.

Retrieves the angle required to rotate the first specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure into the second specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 첫 번째 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체를 두 번째 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체에 대해 회전하는 데 필요한 각도를 검색합니다.

trans-unit.source: The angle in degrees needed to rotate <paramref name="vector1" /> into <paramref name="vector2" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="vector1" />을 <paramref name="vector2" />에 대해 회전하는 데 필요한 각도(도)입니다.

trans-unit.source: Signed angles do not extend into [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] space, so an angle between 0 and 180 degrees is returned.
trans-unit.target: 부호 있는 각도으로 확장 되지 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] 공간, 않으므로 각도 0 사이의 180도 반환 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to get the angle between two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structures.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에는 두 개의 사이의 각도 가져오는 방법을 보여 줍니다 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to evaluate.
The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to evaluate.
Calculates the cross product of two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structures.
The cross product of <paramref name="vector1" /> and <paramref name="vector2" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to be divided.
The scalar to divide <c>vector</c> by.
Divides the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure by the specified scalar and returns the result as a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체를 지정된 스칼라로 나누고 그 결과를 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />로 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The result of dividing <paramref name="vector" /> by <paramref name="scalar" />.
The following example shows how to divide a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure by a scalar.
trans-unit.target: 분할 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 는 스칼라 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to evaluate.
The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to evaluate.
Calculates the dot product of two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structures.
The dot product of <paramref name="vector1" /> and <paramref name="vector2" />.
The following example shows how to calculate the dot product of two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structures.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 두 개의의 내적을 계산 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structures for equality.
The object to compare.

Determines whether the specified object is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure and whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z" /> properties of the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" /> are equal to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z" /> properties of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 개체가 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체인지 확인하고, 지정된 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X" />의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z" /> 및 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 속성이 이 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X" /> 구조체의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z" /> 및 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 속성과 같은지 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="o" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure and is identical with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure; <see langword="false" /> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="o" />가 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체이고 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체와도 같으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: If `o` is not a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure, this method returns `false`.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> values are described using <xref:System.Double> values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 값을 사용 하 여 설명 <xref:System.Double> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Because the value of a <xref:System.Double> can lose precision when operated upon, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> values that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 때문에 값을 한 <xref:System.Double> 두 간의 비교에 연산을 수행 하는 경우에 정밀도 떨어질 수 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 논리적으로 동일한 값을 실패할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to check if an <xref:System.Object> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure are equal.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 확인 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.는 <xref:System.Object> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조는 동일 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The instance of Vector to compare against this instance.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structures for equality.
<see langword="true" /> if instances are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스가 서로 같으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> values are described using <xref:System.Double> values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 값을 사용 하 여 설명 <xref:System.Double> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Because the value of a <xref:System.Double> can lose precision when operated upon, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> values that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 때문에 값을 한 <xref:System.Double> 두 간의 비교에 연산을 수행 하는 경우에 정밀도 떨어질 수 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 논리적으로 동일한 값을 실패할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: First <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> to compare.
Second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> to compare.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structures for equality.

<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z" /> components of <paramref name="vector1" /> and <paramref name="vector2" /> are equal; <see langword="false" /> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="vector1" />과 <paramref name="vector2" />의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y" /> 및 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z" /> 구성 요소가 같으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structures are equal if the values of their <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z%2A> properties are the same.
trans-unit.target: 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y%2A> 속성의 값이 같으면 두 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z%2A> 구조체가 같습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> values are described using <xref:System.Double> values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 값을 사용 하 여 설명 <xref:System.Double> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Because the value of a <xref:System.Double> can lose precision when operated upon, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> values that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 때문에 값을 한 <xref:System.Double> 두 간의 비교에 연산을 수행 하는 경우에 정밀도 떨어질 수 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 논리적으로 동일한 값을 실패할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example checks whether two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structures are equal.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 두 검사 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조체가 동일 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
A hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
The following example shows how to get the hashcode of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에는의 해시 코드를 가져오는 방법을 보여 줍니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
The length of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
The length of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> is sometimes referred to as the magnitude.
The following example shows how to get the length of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 길이를 가져오는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the square of the length of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
The square of the length of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
The length of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> is sometimes referred to as the magnitude.
The following example shows how to get the square of the length of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 길이 제곱을 가져오는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: Multiplies the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure by the specified <see cref="T:System.Double" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> and returns the result.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체와 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 또는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" />를 곱하고 그 결과를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The scalar to multiply.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to multiply.
Multiplies the specified scalar by the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure and returns the result as a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 스칼라와 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체를 곱하고 그 결과를 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />로 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The result of multiplying <paramref name="scalar" /> and <paramref name="vector" />.
The following example shows how to multiply a scalar by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: Scalar 곱하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to multiply.
The scalar to multiply.
Multiplies the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure by the specified scalar and returns the result as a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체와 지정된 스칼라를 곱하고 그 결과를 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />로 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The result of multiplying <paramref name="vector" /> and <paramref name="scalar" />.
The following example shows how to multiply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure by a scalar.
trans-unit.target: 곱하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 는 스칼라 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to transform.
The transformation to apply to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
Transforms the coordinate space of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure using the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체를 사용하여 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" /> 구조체의 좌표 공간을 변환합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of transforming <paramref name="vector" /> by <paramref name="matrix3D" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="vector" />를 사용하여 <paramref name="matrix3D" />를 변환한 결과를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Multiply%2A> method to transform a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Multiply%2A> 변환 하는 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조체를 통해는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: Negates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
The vector has the same magnitude as before, but its direction is now opposite.
trans-unit.target: 벡터의 크기는 전과 동일하지만 방향은 반대가 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to negate a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 부정 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: Normalizes the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
A normalized <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> maintains its direction but its magnitude becomes `1`.
trans-unit.target: 정규화 된 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 방향을 하지만 크기에는 유지 관리 `1`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> is often called a unit vector.
trans-unit.target: 그 결과 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 단위 벡터가 라고도 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> is normalized by dividing the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> by its magnitude.
The following example shows how to normalize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 정규화 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure or to another <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체 또는 다른 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 구조체에 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체를 추가합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure used to translate the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체를 변환하는 데 사용되는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 구조체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure to be translated.

Translates the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure by the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure and returns the result as a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 구조체로 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체를 변환하고 그 결과를 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 구조체로 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The result of translating <paramref name="point" /> by <paramref name="vector" />.

The following example shows how to use the overloaded addition operator to translate a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 오버 로드 된 더하기 연산자를 사용 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 구조체는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to add.
The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to add.
Adds two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structures and returns the result as a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 두 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체를 추가하고 그 결과를 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체로 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The sum of <paramref name="vector1" /> and <paramref name="vector2" />.
The following example shows how to use the overloaded addition operator to add two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structures.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 두 개의 추가 하는 오버 로드 된 더하기 연산자를 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to be divided.
The scalar to divide <c>vector</c> by.
Divides the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure by the specified scalar and returns the result as a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체를 지정된 스칼라로 나누고 그 결과를 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />로 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The result of dividing <paramref name="vector" /> by <paramref name="scalar" />.
The following example shows how to use the overloaded addition operator to divide a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure by a scalar.
trans-unit.target: 오버 로드 된 더하기 연산자를 사용 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 는 스칼라 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to compare.
The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to compare.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structures for equality.

<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z" /> components of <paramref name="vector1" /> and <paramref name="vector2" /> are equal; <see langword="false" /> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="vector1" />과 <paramref name="vector2" />의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y" /> 및 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z" /> 구성 요소가 같으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structures are equal if the values of their <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z%2A> properties are the same.
trans-unit.target: 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y%2A> 속성의 값이 같으면 두 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z%2A> 구조체가 같습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> values are described using <xref:System.Double> values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 값을 사용 하 여 설명 <xref:System.Double> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Because the value of a <xref:System.Double> can lose precision when operated upon, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> values that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 때문에 값을 한 <xref:System.Double> 두 간의 비교에 연산을 수행 하는 경우에 정밀도 떨어질 수 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 논리적으로 동일한 값을 실패할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the overloaded equality operator to check if two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structures are equal.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 두 개를 확인 하는 오버 로드 된 같음 연산자를 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조체가 동일 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Converts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure into a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure or a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D" />.
The vector to convert.
Converts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure into a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
The result of converting <paramref name="vector" />.
The vector to convert.
Converts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure into a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D" />.
The result of converting <paramref name="vector" />.

Because a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D> structure cannot be negative, the absolute values of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure are used.
trans-unit.target: 때문에 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D> 구조는 음수가 될 수의 절대 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z%2A> 속성의는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to compare.
The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to compare.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structures for inequality.

<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z" /> components of <paramref name="vector3D1" /> and <paramref name="vector3D2" /> are different; <see langword="false" /> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="vector3D1" />과 <paramref name="vector3D2" />의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y" /> 및 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z" /> 구성 요소가 서로 다르면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structures are not equal if the values of their <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z%2A> properties are different.
trans-unit.target: 두 개의 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조가 같지 않은지 경우 값을 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z%2A> 속성은 서로 다릅니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> values are described using <xref:System.Double> values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 값을 사용 하 여 설명 <xref:System.Double> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Because the value of a <xref:System.Double> can lose precision when operated upon, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> values that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 때문에 값을 한 <xref:System.Double> 두 간의 비교에 연산을 수행 하는 경우에 정밀도 떨어질 수 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 논리적으로 동일한 값을 실패할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the overloaded inequality operator to check if two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structures are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 두 개를 확인 하는 오버 로드 된 같지 않음 연산자를 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조체가 동일 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Multiplies the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure by the specified <see cref="T:System.Double" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> and returns the result.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체와 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 또는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" />를 곱하고 그 결과를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The scalar to multiply.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to multiply.
Multiplies the specified scalar by the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure and returns the result as a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 스칼라와 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체를 곱하고 그 결과를 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />로 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The result of multiplying <paramref name="scalar" /> and <paramref name="vector" />.
The following example shows how to multiple a scalar by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 방법으로 여러 scalar는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to multiply.
The scalar to multiply.
Multiplies the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure by the specified scalar and returns the result as a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체와 지정된 스칼라를 곱하고 그 결과를 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />로 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The result of multiplying <paramref name="vector" /> and <paramref name="scalar" />.
The following example shows how to multiply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure by a scalar.
trans-unit.target: 곱하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 는 스칼라 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to transform.
The transformation to apply to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
Transforms the coordinate space of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure using the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체를 사용하여 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" /> 구조체의 좌표 공간을 변환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The result of transforming <paramref name="vector" /> by <paramref name="matrix" />.

The following example shows how to use the overloaded multiplication operator to transform a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 오버 로드 된 곱하기 연산자를 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조체는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: Subtracts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure or a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to be subtracted from.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure to subtract from <c>vector</c>.
Subtracts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
The result of subtracting <paramref name="point" /> from <paramref name="vector" />.

The following example shows how to use the overloaded subtraction operator to subtract a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure from a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 빼기를 오버 로드 된 연산자를 사용 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 에서 구조체는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to be subtracted from.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to subtract from <c>vector1</c>.
Subtracts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
The result of subtracting <paramref name="vector2" /> from <paramref name="vector1" />.

The following example shows how to use the overloaded subtraction operator to subtract a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure from a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 빼기를 오버 로드 된 연산자를 사용 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 에서 구조체는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to negate.
Negates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.

A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure with <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z" /> values opposite of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z" /> values of <paramref name="vector" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="vector" />의 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X" /> 및 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y" /> 값에 반대인 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X" /> 및 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y" /> 값을 갖는 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z" /> 구조체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure has the same magnitude (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Length%2A>) as `vector` but its direction is opposite of that of `vector`.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조에 같은 크기 (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Length%2A>)으로 `vector` 같지만 방향은 반대의의 `vector`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the overloaded negation operator to negate a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 부정 하는 오버 로드 된 부정 연산자를 사용 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/includes/tla2sharptla-3d-md.md)] vector.

Converts a <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] vector into the equivalent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] 벡터의 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 표현을 해당 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체로 변환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.

The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Parse%2A> method to convert a string representation of a vector3D into a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Parse%2A> vector3D의 문자열 표현으로 변환 하는 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: Subtracts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure or a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to be subtracted from.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure to subtract from <c>vector</c>.
Subtracts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
The result of subtracting <paramref name="point" /> from <paramref name="vector" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to be subtracted from.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to subtract from <c>vector1</c>.
Subtracts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
The result of subtracting <paramref name="vector2" /> from <paramref name="vector1" />.
The following example shows how to subtract a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure from a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 뺄 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 에서 구조체는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: The string specifying the format to use.
-or-
<see langword="null" /> to use the default format defined for the type of the <see cref="T:System.IFormattable" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IFormattable" /> 구현 형식에 대해 정의된 기본 형식을 사용하기 위한 <see langword="null" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="IFormatProvider" /> to use to format the value.
trans-unit.target: 값의 형식을 지정하는 데 사용할 <see langword="IFormatProvider" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see langword="null" /> to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 운영 체제의 현재 로캘 설정에서 숫자 형식 정보를 가져오기 위한 <see langword="null" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: This member is part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly by your code.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 인프라의 일부이며 사용자 코드에서 직접 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.IFormattable.ToString(System.String,System.IFormatProvider)" />.
String representation of this object.
Creates a <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
Creates a <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.

A string containing the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z" /> values of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X" /> 구조체의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z" /> 및 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 값이 포함된 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: Culture-specific formatting information.
Creates a <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.

Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z" /> values of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 구조체의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y" /> 및 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z" /> 값이 포함된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X" /> component of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X" /> 구조체의 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구성 요소를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X" /> component of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
The default value is <c>0</c>.
The following example shows how to calculate the dot product of two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structures.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 두 개의의 내적을 계산 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: It also shows how to assign values to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure when the structure is being declared and after the structure has been declared.
trans-unit.target: 또한 값을 할당 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조를 선언할 때와 구조 선언 된 후 구성 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y" /> component of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y" /> component of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
The default value is <c>0</c>.
The following example shows how to calculate the dot product of two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structures.

The default value is <c>0</c>.
